question: Who is the Chairperson of the task force set up by Government of India on “age of marriage for women”?
explanation:
The Government of India had earlier set up a task force under the chairmanship of Jaya Jaitley, to revisit the apt age for marriage of women. This committee was set up in accordance to the Prime Ministers Independence Day speech on “right age of marriage for women”.
Recently, the panel has submitted its findings in the form of a report to the Ministry of Women & Child Development and to the Prime Minister’s Office.
